content: I study Computational Science and Engineering at the Technical University of Munich, with a focus on Computational Fluid Dynamics and an interest in Climate Modeling. Next to university, I volunteer in the area of civic and political education.
summary: I study Computational Science and Engineering at the Technical University of Munich, with a focus on Computational Fluid Dynamics and an interest in Climate Modeling. Next to university, I volunteer in the area of civic and political education.
title: Valentina Schüller

summary: An open-source, Python-based monitoring tool for the [EC-Earth](http://www.ec-earth.org/) climate model. Developed as part of my internship at the [Swedish Meteorological and Hydrological Institute](https://www.smhi.se/en).
title: EC-Earth 4 Monitoring

summary: My BSc thesis, describing the design and development approach behind the new EC-Earth 4 monitoring tool.
title: Monitoring Numerical Climate Simulations. A Tool for the EC-Earth Climate Model.
